regen.absent_element: privacy assurance for user access to grade information
regen.new_specification: Access to grade details should be restricted to relevant users only.

regen.absent_element: privacy assurance for grade information display
regen.new_specification: The system should ensure that grade details, averages, and overall scores are displayed exclusively to relevant users, ensuring their privacy.

regen.absent_element: Ensuring privacy of grade information when displayed
regen.new_specification: The system should implement a privacy mechanism to ensure that grade information is securely accessible only to relevant users.

label: No other actor should be able to view another one's grades except the course administrator.
absence: no mention of prohibiting anyone other than administrators from viewing others' grades
